data.actual_result: Toast doesn't show up if sync is off
data.expected_result: The toast "Theme/Language/Potato/Whatever has been updated" should appear regardless of whether or not you enabled sync
data.short_description: Toasts indicating that a setting has been updated won't show up if sync across clients is disabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your account settings - Pick any submenu where "sync across clients" option is available. For example, language or appearance - Disable the "sync across clients" option under the submenu you picked - Switch language, change theme, or whatever where you disabled the sync option
